export async function loader(){try{const url="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/funix-subtitle.appspot.com/o/Boutique_products.json?alt=media&token=dc67a5ea-e3e0-479e-9eaf-5e01bcd09c74";const res=await fetch(url);const data=await res.json();const user=getUser();return{data:data,user:user};}catch(err){throw err;}}
